//è§£é‡Šï¼šæ³¨æ„ï¼Œword2 æ¯” word1 é•¿ï¼Œ"rs" éœ€è¦è¿½åŠ åˆ°åˆå¹¶åå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æœ«å°¾ã€‚
//word1ï¼š  a   b 
//word2ï¼š    p   q   r   s
//åˆå¹¶åï¼š  a p b q   r   s

//è§£é‡Šï¼šæ³¨æ„ï¼Œword1 æ¯” word2 é•¿ï¼Œ"cd" éœ€è¦è¿½åŠ åˆ°åˆå¹¶åå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æœ«å°¾ã€‚
//word1ï¼š  a   b   c   d
//word2ï¼š    p   q 
//åˆå¹¶åï¼š  a p b q c   d
// 
//
// 
//
// æç¤ºï¼š 
//
// 
// 1 <= word1.length, word2.length <= 100 
// word1 å’Œ word2 ç”±å°å†™è‹±æ–‡å­—æ¯ç»„æˆ 
// 
//
// Related Topics åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ å­—ç¬¦ä¸² ğŸ‘ 148 ğŸ‘ 0


//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
/**
 * @param {string} word1
 * @param {string} word2
 * @return {string}
 */
var mergeAlternately = function (word1, word2) {
  let len1 = word1.length
  let len2 = word2.length
  if (len1 === 0) return word2
  if (len2 === 0) return word1

  let maxLen = Math.max(len1, len2) - 1
  let str = ''
  for (let i = 0; i <= maxLen; i++) {
    str += (word1[i] || '') + (word2[i] || '')
  }
  return str
};
//leetcode submit region end(Prohibit modification and deletion)

//leetcode submit region begin(Prohibit modification and deletion)
/**
 * @param {string} word1
 * @param {string} word2
 * @return {string}
 */
var mergeAlternately = function (word1, word2) {
  let len1 = word1.length
  let len2 = word2.length
  if (len1 === 0) return word2
  if (len2 === 0) return word1

  let maxLen = Math.max(len1, len2) - 1
  let str = ''
  for (let i = 0; i <= maxLen; i++) {
    str += (word1[i] || '') + (word2[i] || '')
  }
  return str
};
